skill.name: safe_store: Vectorizer Configuration & Management
skill.description: Setting up and managing different embedding models including local and API-based options
skill.content:
## Vectorizer Configuration Patterns
### 1. Sentence Transformers (Local) ```python from safe_store import SafeStore
store = SafeStore( "st_default.db", vectorizer_name="st", vectorizer_config={"model": "all-MiniLM-L6-v2"} ) ```
### 2. OpenAI API ```python store = SafeStore( "openai.db", vectorizer_name="openai", vectorizer_config={"model": "text-embedding-3-small"} ) ```
### 3. Ollama (Local API) ```python store = SafeStore( "ollama.db", vectorizer_name="ollama", vectorizer_config={ "model": "nomic-embed-text", "host": "http://localhost:11434" } ) ```
